answers.answer: I cant answer ur queaion i have no idea ... but my baby was planned ... very planned lol i know the exacte date ov conveption and the scan shows the baby is 4 days bigger than it should be. So im hoping its a good thing tbh x

Sometimes u just have a big baby or in my case a small baby.  My uterus is right on track for 25wks but my baby measures a week less than my due date. I know exactly the first day of my last period & my due date is August 12th. My ob poses no concern since he's growing at an healthy rate.

My baby at the ultrasound last week was measuring 3 days ahead so its a good thing. I'm hoping it just means the baby will come a few days before the due date lol. But I know its normal for the baby to measure ahead

I wish my little one was only measuring days ahead, lol. He's measuring 2 weeks ahead. So now I have to go to the doc twice a week to keep an eye on how big he gets. My blood pressure is high, so they want to make sure he doesn't put too much strain on my body.
But, at least we knoe he's healthy :)
I was told my baby was a week ahead! I'm just hoping my baby isn't HUGEE since I'm attempting a VBAC!!

I have an ultra sound on the first to see how my big my baby is. The Dr said he already knows she's big and plus I have gestational diabetes which usually causes the baby to be big... I'm super nervous to see how big she is.

question: Doctor sed that the measurments of the baby are 5 days bigger then they shud be .so now im going to make an appt for an ultrasound specialist to see how big the baby really is .  Is this normal?
title: bigger baby?
